:::overview
This course covers the creation of an online portfolio. All other courses we offer involve exercises that lead to creation of products as part of an online portfolio. Knowledge of the content covered in this course is thus a pre-requisite a pre-requisite for all our main courses.
:::

:::objectives
* Know what an online portfolio is.
* Knowing the reasons for having an online portfolio.
* Be familiar with the tools we use to generate an online portfolio.
* Be able to create an online portfolio.
:::
